long_description: This polyethylene container with polypropylene squirt cap is great for carrying kitchen or bath essentials such as cooking oil or shampoo. Screw-on lid has a lift up squirt tab to dispense liquids in small, controlled amounts. Reusable container is recyclable. Compact size is ideal for backpacking, camping or travel.
short_description: This polyethylene container with polypropylene squirt cap is great for carrying kitchen or bath essentials such as cooking oil or shampoo.
